attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like Mr Brown to watch the Churchill adverts and mimic the 'Oh yes' and 'Oh no' expressions while answering questions about the Labour invasion of Iraq and the planned proposals to build more houses for people to buy that could eventually be purchased under the Right To Buy scheme. Using them each week at PMQ in response to the utter diatribe that comes from the mouth of Mr Cameron.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
